sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <el-tabs @tab-click="tabClick" type="border-card" v-model="activeTabName">
      <el-tab-pane :label="$t('i18nView.newAddDiscontinuation')" name="pdIncreaseDiscontinued">
        <pdIncreaseDiscontinued v-if="activeTabName === 'pdIncreaseDiscontinued'" ref="pdIncreaseDiscontinuedPage"
            ></pdIncreaseDiscontinued>
      </el-tab-pane>
      <el-tab-pane :label="$t('i18nView.stopSaleBack')" name="pdDiscontinuedBack">
        <pdDiscontinuedBack v-if="activeTabName === 'pdDiscontinuedBack'" ref="pdDiscontinuedBackPage"
            ></pdDiscontinuedBack>
      </el-tab-pane>
    </el-tabs>
  </cus-wraper>
</template>
<script>
	import pdIncreaseDiscontinued from '@/views/product-revision/pd-increase-discontinued';
	import pdDiscontinuedBack from '@/views/product-revision/pd-discontinued-back';

	let _this
	export default {
		name: "productDiscontinuation",
		/*guolvqi*/
		filters: {
			getPdAuditConc(state) {
				if (state == 'N') {
					state = '不通过'
				} else {
					state = '通过'
				}
				return state
			},
			filter_pdCls2(code) {
				return _this.getCodeName('ProductCategory', code, true)
			},
			filter_pdCls6(code) {
				return _this.getCodeName('InsuranceNature', code, true)
			},
			filterReleasetype(val) {
				return _this.getCodeName('releasetype', val)
			},
			filterReleaseTypeDet(val) {
				return _this.getCodeName('releasetypedet', val)
			},
			fileReleaseContent(val) {
				return _this.getCodeName('pdReleContent', val)
			},
			filterReleaseWay(val) {
				return _this.getCodeName('releaseway', val)
			}
		},
    components: {
	    pdIncreaseDiscontinued,
	    pdDiscontinuedBack
    },
		data() {
			_this = this
			return {
				activeTabName: 'pdIncreaseDiscontinued',
				activatedTabNames: ['pdIncreaseDiscontinued'],
			}
		},
		created() {

		},
		watch: {},
		methods: {
			// 切换标签页
			tabClick(tab) {
        let flag = false;
        this.activatedTabNames.forEach(value => {
        	if(value === tab.name){
        		flag = true
          }
        });
        if(flag === false){
        	this.activatedTabNames.push(tab.name)
        }
			}
		}
	}
</script>
